Sequence.description: A built-in Identity Sequence for the Guest Portal
Sequence.name: Guest_Portal_Sequence

option.name: Do not access other stores in the sequence and set the AuthenticationStatus attribute to ProcessError
Treat as if the user was not found and proceed to the next store in the sequence

Sequence.description: A built-in Identity Sequence for the Sponsor Portal
Sequence.name: Sponsor_Portal_Sequence

option.name: Do not access other stores in the sequence and set the AuthenticationStatus attribute to ProcessError
Treat as if the user was not found and proceed to the next store in the sequence

Sequence.description: A built-in Identity Sequence for the My Devices Portal
Sequence.name: MyDevices_Portal_Sequence

option.name: Do not access other stores in the sequence and set the AuthenticationStatus attribute to ProcessError
Treat as if the user was not found and proceed to the next store in the sequence

Sequence.description: A built-in Identity Sequence to include all User Identity Stores
Sequence.name: All_User_ID_Stores

option.name: Do not access other stores in the sequence and set the AuthenticationStatus attribute to ProcessError
Treat as if the user was not found and proceed to the next store in the sequence

Sequence.description: A built-in Identity Sequence for Certificate Request APIs
Sequence.name: Certificate_Request_Sequence

option.name: Do not access other stores in the sequence and set the AuthenticationStatus attribute to ProcessError
Treat as if the user was not found and proceed to the next store in the sequence

Profile.description: Default profile used to blacklist wireless devices. Ensure that you configure a BLACKHOLE ACL on the Wireless LAN Controller.
Profile.name: Blackhole_Wireless_Access

Profile.description: Default profile used for Cisco Phones.
Profile.name: Cisco_IP_Phones

Profile.description: Default Profile used to redirect users to the CWA portal.
Profile.name: Cisco_WebAuth

Profile.description: Default Profile with access type as Access-Reject
Profile.name: DenyAccess

Profile.description: Onboard the device with Native Supplicant Provisioning
Profile.name: NSP_Onboard

Profile.description: Default Profile used for Non Cisco Phones.
Profile.name: Non_Cisco_IP_Phones

Profile.description: Default Profile with access type as Access-Accept
Profile.name: PermitAccess
